title: A・ZU・NA’s Live Concert - Day 1:
detail_text: <:th_ch0207/>It’s finally the day of A・ZU・NA’s live concert~! I threw a lot of soybeans yesterday to ward off any bad luck, so today’s live concert is gonna go great!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Well, I drank lots of lucky tea at home!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Lucky tea? Setsuna-chan, do you know what that is?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>No...... Shizuku-san, what’s lucky tea?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Lucky tea is a drink made with soybeans from Setsubun, kelp, and pickled plums. It’s supposed to bring good fortune.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Huh. I didn’t know that was a thing.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>I would have drank some if I knew about it...<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Actually, I knew you’d want to try it, so I brought some! Let’s drink some together for good energy!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Okay, sure! Let’s show everyone what we’ve practiced!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>The audience is waiting for us! Let’s get ready~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
